build.buildCommand: npm run build && mkdir -p storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R a+rw storage

deploy.startCommand: echo 'Starting Laravel application...' && echo 'Environment: '$APP_ENV && echo 'Debug: '$APP_DEBUG && echo 'Database: '$DB_HOST':'$DB_PORT && php artisan config:clear && echo 'Running migrations...' && php artisan migrate --force --verbose && echo 'Starting server on port: '$PORT && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT:-8000} --verbose
